title: can i pls have 5 rp
body: only 5 off of the jg icon pls send halp

replies.body:
If you make a painting or drawing and send it to Riot Games via. support ticket, i'm sure they will help you out.

Worked for some other guy that wanted Academy Ahri and needed like 4rp or something.
Yeah the same thing for me. I needed 11RP for the pool party Lulu skin. So I drew a picture, sent it in and got that RP :D
I wonder what the max amount of rp would be if you drew a pic for Riot.
